jhelp.util.gui
Class JHelpImage

java.lang.Object
  jhelp.util.gui.JHelpImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstantsGUI
public class JHelpImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConstantsGUI

Represents an image.
You can draw on image only this image is on draw mode, see startDrawMode(), endDrawMode() and isDrawMode().
You can also create JHelpSprite, that are small image that can be easy animated.
The image is refresh at screen , only if exit of drw mode endDrawMode() or call update()

Author:
JHelp

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface jhelp.util.gui.ConstantsGUI
AFFINE_TRANSFORM, FLATNESS, FONT_RENDER_CONTEXT

doAlphaMix - Indicates if we do the mixing true, or we just override false
